content.value:
*PUBLIC ANNOUNCEMENT*

Please stop saying "This is giving me PTSD" or "This gave me PTSD" when it... didn't.

It undermines what people with PTSD (like myself) actually have to go through on a day-to-day basis, and it's not because we saw someone wearing socks with Crocs.
